name: norm_indicator_eq_indicator_norm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s : Set α
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ Eq (Norm.norm (s.indicator f a)) (s.indicator (fun a => Norm.norm (f a)) a)
decl:
theorem norm_indicator_eq_indicator_norm : ‖indicator s f a‖ = indicator s (fun a => ‖f a‖) a :=
  flip congr_fun a (indicator_comp_of_zero norm_zero).symm

name: nnnorm_indicator_eq_indicator_nnnorm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s : Set α
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ Eq (NNNorm.nnnorm (s.indicator f a)) (s.indicator (fun a => NNNorm.nnnorm (f a)) a)
decl:
theorem nnnorm_indicator_eq_indicator_nnnorm :
    ‖indicator s f a‖₊ = indicator s (fun a => ‖f a‖₊) a :=
  flip congr_fun a (indicator_comp_of_zero nnnorm_zero).symm

name: enorm_indicator_eq_indicator_enorm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s : Set α
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ Eq (ENorm.enorm (s.indicator f a)) (s.indicator (fun a => ENorm.enorm (f a)) a)
decl:
lemma enorm_indicator_eq_indicator_enorm :
    ‖indicator s f a‖ₑ = indicator s (fun a => ‖f a‖ₑ) a :=
  flip congr_fun a (indicator_comp_of_zero enorm_zero).symm

name: norm_indicator_le_of_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s t : Set α
h : HasSubset.Subset s t
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ LE.le (Norm.norm (s.indicator f a)) (Norm.norm (t.indicator f a))
decl:
theorem norm_indicator_le_of_subset (h : s ⊆ t) (f : α → E) (a : α) :
    ‖indicator s f a‖ ≤ ‖indicator t f a‖ := by
  simp only [norm_indicator_eq_indicator_norm]
  exact indicator_le_indicator_of_subset ‹_› (fun _ => norm_nonneg _) _

name: indicator_norm_le_norm_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s : Set α
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ LE.le (s.indicator (fun a => Norm.norm (f a)) a) (Norm.norm (f a))
decl:
theorem indicator_norm_le_norm_self : indicator s (fun a => ‖f a‖) a ≤ ‖f a‖ :=
  indicator_le_self' (fun _ _ => norm_nonneg _) a

name: norm_indicator_le_norm_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
E : Type u_2
inst✝ : SeminormedAddCommGroup E
s : Set α
f : α → E
a : α
⊢ LE.le (Norm.norm (s.indicator f a)) (Norm.norm (f a))
decl:
theorem norm_indicator_le_norm_self : ‖indicator s f a‖ ≤ ‖f a‖ := by
  rw [norm_indicator_eq_indicator_norm]
  apply indicator_norm_le_norm_self
